### 세계속의 경기도


```{r crosstalk-cs}
# https://nicar.r-journalism.com/docs/crosstalk-flexdashboard-leaflet-datatable/
  
library(crosstalk)
library(leaflet)
library(DT)
library(d3scatter)



shared_quakes <- SharedData$new(quakes[sample(nrow(quakes), 100),])
bscols(
  leaflet(shared_quakes, width = "100%", height = 300) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(),
  d3scatter(shared_quakes, ~depth, ~mag, width = "100%", height = 300)
)

```
